name: flutterclient
description: The Flutter Client is a mobile app for the [JVx framework](https://doc.sibvisions.com/jvx). It's super generic and renders work-screens dynamically. The app supports all layout features of JVx and comes with a default menu and login mechanism. It's designed as standalone app and also as library. This means that you can easily extend the library and create your own app.

scripts.increasebuildnumber: run-s increaseBuildNumberPubspecYaml && run-s setBuildDate && run-s increaseBuildNumberAppVersionJson
scripts.increasebuildnumberwin: run-s increaseBuildNumberPubspecYamlWin & run-s setBuildDateWin & run-s increaseBuildNumberAppVersionJsonWin
scripts.xcodeBuildStep2: xcodebuild -workspace ios/runner.xcworkspace -scheme Runner -sdk iphoneos -configuration AppStoreDistribution archive -archivePath $PWD/deploy/ios/Runner.xcarchive
scripts.buildios: flutter clean && rm ios/Podfile && flutter build ios && run-s xcodeBuildStep1 && run-s xcodeBuildStep2 && run-s xcodeBuildStep3
scripts.buildandroid: flutter clean && run-s setBuildDate && run-s updateCommitAppVersionJson && run-s increasebuildnumber && flutter build apk --release
